task.title: Sand The Platen Roller
task.shortdesc: You can sand a typewriter platen by gently rubbing the platen surface with fine grit sandpaper.

step.cmd: Wrap a sheet of fine-grit sandpaper around the platen roller.
Apply gentle pressure with the sandpaper while rotating the platen roller by hand.
Gently work the sandpaper up and down the length of the platen roller until all hardened rubber is removed.
Use a damp cloth to remove sand debris from the platen roller.

step.note: Dry the platen roller quickly to avoid moisture damage.
step.cmd: Place the platen roller in front of a fan to air dry.
